title: Mourning Frost
content:
dropped by Dhourn after defeating the Spectator west of the Underdark Fort. Frostbite: When taking cold damage, takes an additional 1 cold damage per turn of Frostbite remaining.

Mourning Frost Notes & Tips

Rarity: Very Rare Value: 770 Gp. Weight: 1.8 Kg. ID: 98847bbd-c306-ff36-be28-64e7d2063cdc UUID: cab10a42-8c85-459a-9d68-b4836388c022

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos F
